Description: Fragment of oval handle from a Thasian pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine micaceous light purplish brown. Rectangular stamp at top of handle with Greek inscription and bow and arrow symbol.
Curator's comments: Name Herakleitos. Bon, A. and A., Les timbres amphoriques de Thasos (Paris 1957) 718. Petrie diary, 1884-1885 (EES Archive XVII 47), p. 102, 40b.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0020)
